aws_datasync_location_smb.description: Manages an AWS DataSync SMB Location

agent_arns.description: A list of DataSync Agent ARNs with which this location will be associated.

domain.description: The name of the Windows domain the SMB server belongs to.

mount_options.description: Configuration block containing mount options used by DataSync to access the SMB Server. Can be `AUTOMATIC`, `SMB2`, or `SMB3`.

password.description: The password of the user who can mount the share and has file permissions in the SMB.

server_hostname.description: Specifies the IP address or DNS name of the SMB server. The DataSync Agent(s

subdirectory.description: Subdirectory to perform actions as source or destination. Should be exported by the NFS server.

tags.description: Key-value pairs of resource tags to assign to the DataSync Location.

user.description: The user who can mount the share and has file and folder permissions in the SMB share.
